examples.example: 我在路边捡到一元钱，把它交给了警察叔叔。

translate.english: I picked up one yuan by the roadside and handed it to the police uncle.

examples.example: 我今天用一元钱买了一支漂亮的铅笔，感觉很开心。

translate.english: I bought a beautiful pencil with one yuan today and felt very happy.

examples.example: 我用一元钱坐了一次公交，开启了美好的一天。

translate.english: I took a bus with one yuan and started a beautiful day.
